channel.title: 2022 Winter XR Capstone Team 8
channel.description: Recent content on 2022 Winter XR Capstone Team 8

item.title: Week 1 Snippet
item.description: Members of team 8 first meet each other, brainstormed what we want to do together, and settled on building a whiteboard app the bridges the real and virtual world. Apollo set up the website and Kyle added his bio to the team members' page.

item.title: About Us
item.description: Eric Banisadr Kyle Zhang is a BS/MS student in Paul G. Allen School with a concentration in ML and Robotics. He is very interested in VR/AR and excited to develop for this area for the first time. Yueqian Zhang Apollo Zhu is a BS/MS student studying Computer Engineering, interested in mixed reality and mobile technologies.
